io.sphere.client.shop

Interface CustomObjectService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomObjectServiceImpl

    public interface CustomObjectService
    Sphere HTTP API for working with custom objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeleteRequest<CustomObject> delete(java.lang.String container, java.lang.String key)
      Deletes the object identified by container and key.
      FetchRequest<CustomObject> get(java.lang.String container, java.lang.String key)
      Finds a custom object by container and key.
      <T> CommandRequest<CustomObject> set(java.lang.String container, java.lang.String key, T value)
      Sets the custom object identified by container and key Will overwrite all data that already exists under that key.
      <T> CommandRequest<CustomObject> set(java.lang.String container, java.lang.String key, T value, int version)
      Sets the custom object identified by container and key Will overwrite all data that already exists under that key.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        FetchRequest<CustomObject> get(java.lang.String container,
                             java.lang.String key)
        Finds a custom object by container and key.

      • set

        <T> CommandRequest<CustomObject> set(java.lang.String container,
                                   java.lang.String key,
                                   T value)
        Sets the custom object identified by container and key Will overwrite all data that already exists under that key.

      • set

        <T> CommandRequest<CustomObject> set(java.lang.String container,
                                   java.lang.String key,
                                   T value,
                                   int version)
        Sets the custom object identified by container and key Will overwrite all data that already exists under that key. Fails with ConcurrentModification error if the version of the existing object does not match the given version.

      • delete

        DeleteRequest<CustomObject> delete(java.lang.String container,
                                 java.lang.String key)
        Deletes the object identified by container and key.
